properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:46AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
There is some fog across parts of the ocean waters surrounding
Long Island as well as Long Island Sound and Long Island Bays this
morning. There will be patches of dense fog where visibility will
be reduced to less than 1 mile. The fog is expected to last until
10 AM.

If you encounter the dense fog, proceed with caution. Use proper
fog signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.
